jHelperTip 1.0 demo

Click activated tooltip

$("#test").jHelperTip({
 trigger: "click",
 dC:"#tip1", 
 autoClose: false, 
 opacity: 0.9
});

Hover activated tooltips

$("#test2").jHelperTip({
 trigger: "hover",
 source: "ajax",
 type: "GET", 
 url: 'ajax.html',
 data: 'name=Kean&age=63',
 loadingImg: 'ajax-loader.gif',
 loadingText: 'loading...',
 autoClose: false, 
 opacity: 0.9
});
Matt is doing something dangerous
$(".action img").jHelperTip({
 trigger: "hover", 
 source: "attribute", 
 attrName: "alt", 
 opacity: 0.8, 
 autoClose:true
});
